meanings.definition: A salt or ester of propionic acid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the propionates under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The propionates are commonly used in food preservation.
meanings.sent3: The propionates decided to throw a party in the chemistry lab.
meanings.sent4: The propionates formed a protective shield around the cells.
meanings.sent5: The colorful propionates sparkled like tiny gems in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To treat or impregnate with propionate.
meanings.sent1: The farmer propionates the soil to improve crop growth.
meanings.sent2: She propionates the fabric to make it water-resistant.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally propionates the wrong ingredient in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: His words propionates hope into the hearts of the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The artist propionates the canvas with vibrant colors, creating a masterpiece.
